frontend.game.middlePane.GameStartMiddle: This humorous and interactive program is brought to you by
frontend.game.round.RoundCompletionRateP: ‚ú® Drawing an incorrect link = <incorrect>{penalty} point(s) on the global score</incorrect>

frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.bas: üîÄ Several direct questions on different topics, in a random order.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.bli: üëÇ Listen to the music ({songEmoji}) or the sound ({soundEmoji}), and answer the question.
üã∫ Controls let you adjust the volume and skip forward or backward in the timeline.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.emo: üßê Find the work or place/character/object/... hidden behind each combination of emojis.
üß© This combination may evoke general ideas, or it may just be a rebus, it depends.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.enu: üí¨ Name as many elements as possible that answer the question.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.ima: üßê Find the work or place/character/object/... hidden behind each image.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.lab: Each question consists of an image with numbered markers.
ü´≥ Find the labels corresponding to the markers.
üëÅÔ∏è If you get stuck, the organizers can reveal an element.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.mat: üîÄ A grid organized into {min} to {max} columns of proposals shown in random order, with links between them.
üîó The goal is to find the correct associations.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.mcq: üîÄ Several direct questions on different topics, in a random order.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.nag: üîÄ Several direct questions on different topics, in a random order.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.odd: üîÄ A list of {count} proposals shown in a random order for each participant.
If you know the odd one out, keep it secret... ü§´
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.pro: üïµÔ∏è A list of clues is revealed to you progressively...
üß† Search your memory and guess the work/person/... hidden behind these clues.
frontend.game.round.RoundDescription.quo: ü´≥ One, two or three of these elements are hidden: find them.
üëÅÔ∏è If you get stuck, the organizers can reveal an element.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.basicCorr: If your answer is correct, you earn {points} point.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.basicInco: If your answer is <incorrect>incorrect</incorrect>, you earn no points.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.basicInst: ‚ùì Each question is assigned to a team, which must give their answer verbally.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.buzzInstr: üí° As soon as you have an idea, buzz by clicking "Buzz". You can cancel your buzz by clicking "Cancel".
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.correctEa: If your answer is correct, you earn {points} point and the question ends.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.enumBidMe: The bid is met: the team earns {points} point, +{bonus} bonus point if they give even more answers than announced.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.enumBidNo: The bid is not met: all other teams earn {points} point.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.enumOutco: There are then two possible outcomes:
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.enumPhase: üó£Ô∏è An answer phase during which the team with the highest bid gives their answers.
ü§î A reflection phase during which teams choose their bid.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.enumTwoPh: The question takes place in two phases:
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.incorrect: If your answer is <incorrect>incorrect</incorrect>, your attempt is invalidated and we move to the next player in the queue, if any.
If your answer is incorrect, your attempt is invalidated and we move to the next player in the queue. Furthermore, your buzzer is disabled until clue i + {delay}.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.matchingA: ‚ö†Ô∏è In any case, the link is drawn!
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.matchingC: If the link is <correct>correct</correct>, we move to the next team.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.matchingD: üôÖ A team is disqualified after {maxMistakes} mistakes; the question ends if all teams are disqualified.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.matchingI: If the link is incorrect, the team receives {penalty} point(s) of penalty.
üñ±Ô∏è Each team takes turns and clicks on the proposals for the link it considers correct, left to right.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.matchingT: ‚è≥ You have between {min} and {max} seconds to decide, otherwise a random link will be drawn!
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.mcqInstru: ‚ùì Each question is assigned to a team. The team has several answer choices.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.mixedInst: Rules depend on the question type.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.naguiInst: ‚ùì Each question is assigned to a team. The team has {count} options available:
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.oddOneOut: If the proposal is <correct>correct</correct>, we move to the next team.
If the proposal is incorrect, the question ends and the team receives {penalty} point(s) of penalty. Furthermore, it becomes 1st in the turn order for the next question.
üñ±Ô∏è Each team takes turns and clicks on a proposal from the list it considers correct.
‚ÑπÔ∏è A short explanation is shown each time.
‚è≥ You have {seconds} seconds to decide, otherwise a proposal will be chosen randomly!
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.partialCr: üòà You can earn points even if you do not know all the elements!
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.queueLead: ü•á If you are at the top of the queue, give your answer verbally.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.specialCa: üíú Stay calm, it will be fine.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.specialIn: üó£Ô∏è Answer the questions directly ‚Äî there are no answer choices.
frontend.game.round.RoundRules.thinkingT: ‚è≥ You have {seconds} seconds to answer, otherwise your attempt will be invalidated!
